smg.text: Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Mist at first. A few light rain patches. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
